locations.name: Amalfi
locations.description: The tour begins on the Amalfi Coast, mentioning exploration of Positano and Ravello. Amalfi town serves as a central and representative base for exploring this renowned coastline.

locations.name: Matera
locations.description: Explicitly mentioned as the next destination in Basilicata, focusing on the unique experience of exploring the Sassi districts, implying an overnight stay.

locations.name: Ostuni
locations.description: Located in Puglia's Itria Valley region, which is the final destination. Ostuni is mentioned alongside Locorotondo and the general trulli landscape, making it a plausible base for exploring this area.
